answers.author: Chase Carlile
answers.text:
According to a job posting last fall for a Police Officer in Ankeny, IA,  the city was only interested in hiring non-smokers.  For more information you can contact Dawn Gean, the HR director at 515-965-6408 .  I hope this helps.

answers.author: Josephine Valencia
answers.text:
I don’t have any policies to share, but I have some suggestions on where to look.  I believe fire and police departments have been among the first government Departments to have policies against hiring smokers.  Here are some cities that come to mind:   Manteca CA, Alexandria VA, Arlington VA, and Fairfax County  VA.   Another place to look would be hospitals.  The following hire non-smokers only:  ProMedica (Michigan and Ohio),  Cleveland Clinic, and Crittenton Hospital Medical Center  (Michigan)  
If your thought process is to save on health insurance, it may be simpler to have a two tiered system for smokers and non-smokers.
